item.title: Room Aimée
item.description: Room Aimée is a spacious room with 2 single beds, cozy sitting area, flatscreen TV and desk. The private bathroom has a walk-in rain shower, a bath, toilet and double sink. Do you like a spacious bathroom with a bathtub? Then room Aimée is for you!

item.title: Room Joanna
item.description: Room Joanna is a very spacious room with King size bed (180 cm), flatscreen TV and desk. It has a spacious cozy sitting area. The private bathroom has a walk-in rain shower, toilet and sink. Do you like a spacious luxurious room with a large sitting area? Then room Joanna is for you!

item.title: Room Marie
item.description: Room Marie is a spacious room with King size bed (180 cm), cozy sitting area and desk. Due to the large windows the room enjoys plenty of natural light. The private bathroom has a walk-in rain shower, toilet and sink. Do you like a bright room with cool, soothing colors? Then room Marie is for you!
